u.i: Click here for more details and sign-up

resources.string: Now get the contests schedule of \nHackerRank, CodeChef and HackerEarth,\nall at one place!
The top bar shows the website on which the present contest is hosted.
1. Contest Type\n2. Contest Start/End time (if already started)\n3. Contest Name
Shows the status of the contest: Upcoming, Active or already Ended.
Quickly set an alarm with one click to alert you before the contest starts by tapping here.
Tap anywhere on the contest tile to open up the contest details window and the link for signing-up!
